identification_features.shape: Heart-shaped seed with unequal lobes and a conspicuous notch at hilum end
identification_features.surface_texture: Seed dull with minute reticulations and scattered tubercles,concentrated at the hilum
identification_features.colour: Seed greyish brown with a lighter-coloured pubescence
identification_features.other_features: Flap-like tissue covering the hilum may be present
